import{API}from"../../backend";export var creatCategory=function creatCategory(userId,token,category){return fetch("".concat(API,"/category/create/").concat(userId),{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:JSON.stringify(category)}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};//get all categories
export var getCategories=function getCategories(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/categories"),{method:'GET'}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};//get all products
export var getProducts=function getProducts(){return fetch("".concat(API,"/products"),{method:'GET'}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};// products call
export var createProduct=function createProduct(userId,token,product){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/create/").concat(userId),{method:'POST',headers:{Accept:'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:product}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};//delet a product 
export var deleteProduct=function deleteProduct(productId,userId,token){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/").concat(productId,"/").concat(userId),{method:'DELETE',headers:{Accept:'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};//get a product
export var getProduct=function getProduct(productId){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/").concat(productId),{method:'GET'}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};//update a product
export var updateProduct=function updateProduct(productId,userId,token,product){return fetch("".concat(API,"/product/").concat(productId,"/").concat(userId),{method:'PUT',headers:{Accept:'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)},body:product}).then(function(Response){return Response.json();}).catch(function(err){console.log(err);});};
